20101210081732.429|20101210081733.857|CCO|      For people with COPD,
20101210081733.857|20101210081735.286|CCO|  including chronic bronchitis,
20101210081735.286|20101210081736.714|CCO|       emphysema, or both,
20101210081736.714|20101210081738.143|CCO|   ADVAIR helps significantly
20101210081738.143|20101210081739.571|CCO|     improve lung function.
20101210081739.571|20101210081741.000|CCO| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101210081741.000|20101210081742.000|CCO|  ADVAIR is different from most
20101210081742.000|20101210081743.000|CCO|     other COPD medications
20101210081743.000|20101210081744.000|CCO|       because it contains
20101210081744.000|20101210081745.000|CCO|    both an anti-inflammatory
20101210081745.000|20101210081746.000|CCO|        and a long-acting
20101210081746.000|20101210081747.000|CCO|         bronchodilator,
20101210081747.000|20101210081748.000|CCO|        working together
20101210081748.000|20101210081749.000|CCO|   to help you breathe better.
20101210081749.000|20101210081750.000|CCO|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101210081750.000|20101210081751.000|CCO|  inhalers for sudden symptoms
20101210081751.000|20101210081752.429|CCO|        and should not be
20101210081752.429|20101210081753.857|CCO|   used more than twice a day.
20101210081753.857|20101210081755.286|CCO| People with COPD taking ADVAIR
20101210081755.286|20101210081756.714|CCO|    may have a higher chance
20101210081756.714|20101210081758.143|CCO|          of pneumonia.
20101210081758.143|20101210081759.571|CCO|       ADVAIR may increase
20101210081759.571|20101210081801.000|CCO|    your risk of osteoporosis
